detectors.description:
StakingContract._computeReward(StakingContract.StakeDeposit) (StakingContract_2171.sol#966-990) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- stakingPeriod == 0 (StakingContract_2171.sol#974)

StakingContract._computeRewardRatesWeightedSum(StakingContract.StakeDeposit) (StakingContract_2171.sol#992-1029) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- stakeDeposit.startCheckpointIndex == stakeDeposit.endCheckpointIndex (StakingContract_2171.sol#1002)
StakingContract.toggleRewards(bool).index (StakingContract_2171.sol#788) is a local variable never initialiazed
detectors.markdown: [StakingContract.toggleRewards(bool).index](StakingContract_2171.sol#L788) is a local variable never initialiazed

elements.name: require(bool,string)(token.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount),[Deposit] Something went wrong during the token transfer)

detectors.description:

	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- StakeDeposited(msg.sender,amount) (StakingContract_2171.sol#735)
